# Lime Green Studio

> Product Studio | Idea to Product in 4 Weeks

## About Us

Lime Green Studio is a product development studio that transforms ideas into fully-functional products in just 4 weeks. We specialize in building MVPs and production-ready applications for startups and founders.

## What We Do

We follow a clear 4-week process:

### Week 1: Research
- Understand the problem, users, and market
- Validate the idea
- Align on what to build and what not to

### Week 2: Design
- Design user-first UI
- Focus on clarity and conversion
- Create designs that bring value to users

### Week 3: Development
- Build using modern tech stack
- Focus on core features first
- No over-engineering

### Week 4: Testing & Launch
- Test thoroughly
- Fix issues
- Polish the product
- Launch when stable

## Our Expertise

- Product Research & Validation
- UI/UX Design
- Web & Mobile Development (React, Next.js, Flutter)
- AI & Machine Learning Integration
- API Development (Node.js)
- Database Design & Management
- Testing & Quality Assurance
- Product Launch & Deployment

## Notable Projects

### TanglishCaptions
AI-powered vernacular video captioning tool for Tamil/Tanglish content creators. Built in collaboration with Supermeme.ai founder Sanjeev N C. Reduces manual captioning time from 4 hours to 40 seconds.

### ComeAlign
A Gen-Z dating app that retires blind swipe culture. Matches users based on zodiac compatibility rooted in astrological research. Built with Flutter for iOS and Android, featuring colorful and engaging design.

### Silverbox.ai
AI-powered jewelry personalization platform that solves the "ShelfWear" problem. Uses Style DNA to match women with jewelry that fits their personal aesthetics. Built with founder Mariappan Muthiah, backed by MudhalVC.

### SuperMatch
AI-powered networking platform for Tamil Nadu's startup ecosystem. Connects students, founders, service providers, and investors based on intent and relevance. Built with Entrepreneurs of Madras.

## Our Philosophy

- We trust founders, not just ideas
- Ideas are cheap, execution is everything
- Build for real users, not just stakeholders
- Ship fast, iterate faster
- No over-engineering, just what's needed

## Tech Stack

- **Frontend:** React, Next.js, Tailwind CSS, Flutter
- **Backend:** Node.js, Express
- **AI/ML:** TensorFlow, PyTorch, OpenAI APIs
- **Databases:** PostgreSQL, MongoDB, Firebase
- **Cloud:** AWS, Google Cloud, Vercel
- **Mobile:** Flutter (iOS & Android)

## Stats

- 15+ clients from around the world
- 4-week average time from idea to product
- Projects spanning AI, E-commerce, Social Apps, and more

## Services

We offer end-to-end product development:
- Initial consultation and project scoping
- Product strategy and planning
- Design and prototyping
- Full-stack development
- AI/ML integration
- Quality assurance and testing
- Deployment and launch
- Post-launch support

## Target Audience

- Early-stage startups
- Solo founders
- Product managers with ideas
- Companies needing MVP development
- Businesses looking to validate new product ideas

## Value Proposition

Turn your idea into a production-ready product in 4 weeks. No unnecessary features, no over-engineering, just what you need to launch and validate.

## How We Work

1. **Discovery Call:** Understand your vision and requirements
2. **Proposal:** Clear scope, timeline, and pricing
3. **Agreement:** Sign contract and make initial payment
4. **Execution:** 4-week sprint following our proven process
5. **Delivery:** Tested, polished, ready-to-launch product
6. **Support:** Post-launch assistance and maintenance options

## Location

Tamil Nadu, India (serving clients worldwide)

- Product development
